entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet workload restore fails when encountering solution folder #25592
  • The remote certificate is invalid because of errors in the certificate chain: NotSignatureValid #25582

Closed

  • Send Hot Reload message from C# in own app to browser reload script #25466
  • [dotnet-watch] hot reload script injection should be more permisive. #25510

PullRequests

Created

  • Define 'DeploymentResponse' to parse Zip Deploy status response #25600
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1785499 #25599
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Respond to dotnet/runtime#69680 #25596

Merged

  • [6.0.3xx] Disable Microsoft.DN.Compatibility pkg #25597
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.1 to the current framework #25350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the netcoreapp2.1 and netcoreapp2.2 to the current framework #25039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1784305 #25567
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Version Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility same as SDK #25590
    Area-Compatibility
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25522
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet-watch] Fixes an infinite loop of reloads when the process fails to start #25533
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [dotnet-watch] Updates the request path to always be host relative #25534
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Switch the last non-helix test over to running on helix. #25324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rules to make sure enums match #25542
    Area-Compatibility
  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded net3.1 to the current framework #24900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp3.0 to the current framework #24979
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.0 to the current framework #25476
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx
